title: Ancient Humans Left a Bigger Ecological Footprint Than Scientists Thought
description: New research indicates that humans shaped their environments through hunting and controlled use of fire tens of thousands of years before agriculture emerged. According to the study’s co-authors, the findings offer a revised view of how early humans interacted with the landscape. Picture Europe tens of thousands of years ago as a landscape dominated by [...]

title: US Lake Discovery Reveals Secrets of Ancient Civilization
description: Sixteen ancient canoes have been found in Lake Mendota, and the oldest is thought to be older than the Great Pyramids of Giza.
